inputs.description: The output file format for pandoc to use.

tasks.label: Build
tasks.command: pandoc report.md -s --template template.tex --bibliography=report.bib --csl=ieee.csl --filter pandoc-citeproc --variable classoption=twocolumn --variable papersize=letter --variable geometry=margin=1in -o ../dist/report.${input:pandocOutputFormat}
